author: dims
msg: trying to standardize pom's. using the technique where the parent pom has the version defined and in all the children we use that property for the dependency version to overcome maven issue - MNG-2796. commented tools for the time being, needs a bit more work

author: awiner
msg: ADFFACES-374: In JSF1.2, configurators should use setRequest and setResponse where possible
Code simplifies configurators to use getRequest and setRequest instead of overriding the
entire ExternalContext - and complicates it a bit to deal with JSF RI bug 493 (fixed
